issues.description: The solution’s PersonResource.getAllPersons method signature requires a mandatory “limit” request parameter that is neither mentioned in the problem statement nor supplied by the template client’s getAllPersons call. This mismatch will cause 400 errors for missing parameters and blocks the intended retrieval of all persons.
issues.suggested_fix: Either remove the “limit” parameter from the PersonResource.getAllPersons endpoint so it matches the client and specification, or give it a defaultValue and update the client to send a limit query parameter. Ensuring the server endpoint signature matches the template client call will restore consistency.
